inscription: Cardboard strip on former backing sheet with ormanemtal pattern in pencil with inscription: CATALANA / Barcelona 1963
medium: Pen, brush, brown ink and wash, yellow green wash, and gold foil collage element on paper
provenance: Mr. and Mrs. Julius E. Davis; given to MIA, 1986.
signed: UR, LR in brown ink: Cuevas; LL in brown ink: Barcelona 63  |  Verso: UL in black ink: José Luis Cuevas \'Mujer CATALANA\' Barcelona. ABRIL 1963
title: Catalan Woman
